optimization_lever.description: Switch flatiter bool-mask lane counting to a branchless, unrolled accumulator
optimization_lever.rationale: Bool-mask validation is a packet hotspot; replacing iterator/filter counting with a branchless unrolled path lowers per-lane overhead while preserving contract behavior.
optimization_lever.risk_note: Risk is low because only counting mechanics changed; bounds checks and all error-class branches remain unchanged.

isomorphism.ordering_tiebreak_note: Optimization changes only bool-mask true-counting internals; index validation, mask-length checks, and all error-class pathways remain behavior-isomorphic.

quality_gates.command: rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin generate_packet004_optimization_report

rch exec -- cargo run -p fnp-conformance --bin run_workflow_scenario_gate -- --log-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-004/workflow_scenario_packet004_opt_e2e.jsonl --artifact-index-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-004/workflow_scenario_packet004_opt_artifact_index.json --report-path artifacts/phase2c/FNP-P2C-004/workflow_scenario_packet004_opt_reliability.json --retries 0 --flake-budget 0 --coverage-floor 1.0

notes: Profile report captures baseline/rebaseline distributions with environment fingerprint and reproducibility command.
Isomorphism checks cover all-true and sparse bool-mask selection plus mismatch/error-path parity.
Optimization accepted under EV gate with score 24.0 and no observed behavior drift.
Post-change workflow scenario gate rerun passed with 298/298 cases and coverage_ratio=1.0.
